summary: When an ancient statue is moved for display in Expo '70, a giant, vaguely Triceratops-like monster is released. The monster goes to Japan in pursuit of the statue and ends up battling Gamera, the giant flying turtle.
cast: Tsutomu Takakuwa|Kelly Varis|Katherine Murphy|Kon Ohmura|Junko Yashiro|Franz Gruber|Ryô Hayami|Umenosuke Izumi|Akira Natsuki|Corinne Orr|Chico Lourant
title: Gamera contra Jiger, el señor del caos
